content.rendered:
Spiritual Practices

Chanting ♦ GEOKC Satsang Services ♦ Importance of Japa ♦ Best Method of Meditation ♦ Worshipping Lila Avatar ♦ Doing Selfless Services ♦ Joining Retreat Events

Chanting

Kirtan chants, self-study or swadhyaya, Gita path (study), sacred texts chants & recitations

Coming soon….

GEOKC Satsang Services

Association with truth

Includes a special attraction of Sravana Bhakti, the first activity of Bhakti Yoga which means hearing of Lord’s Lilas in the form of spiritual discourse with the company of Pujya Guruji.

Meaning of Satsang

Significance of Satsang

Satsang Services

Mantra (Japa) Meditation

Worshipping Lila Avatar
